altername_name: Tout Savoir CE1: L'Essentiel du Programme
name: Tout Savoir CE1
overview: No more holiday notebooks! Make way for holiday cartridges! This version of Tout Savoir offers a fun way to revise the programs for the large kindergarten section (reading, maths, discovery of the world) and CP (maths and French). A statistical tool allowing you to follow your progress in each subject.
